data.title: Aquarium of the Pacific
data.meta_description: Take a journey of discovery through the worldâ€™s largest ocean at the Aquarium of the Pacific in Long Beach, California.
data.text:
Timed tickets or advanced reservations are required for weekends and holidays. They are strongly recommended for weekday visits.

The Aquarium is open 7 days a week.

On select days, the Aquarium offers special hours from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. This includes August 24-25, 31; September 1-2, 7-8, 14-15, 22, 28-29; October 5, 13, 19, 26-27.

1Do you need a ticket? Purchase a timed ticket online.

If you are purchasing a ticket online, you do not need to make a separate reservation since you will be asked to select a time during the ticket purchase. Please note: Children under 3 years old do not require a reservation.

Buy Tickets

(includes reservation)

Already have a ticket or coupon? Make a free reservation.

Once you have your reservation, present your reservation at your selected time to the staff onsite at the Aquarium. If you already purchased tickets, you will be directed to the entrance. If you need to purchase tickets with a coupon/discount, you will be directed to do so at our ticket windows. Please note: Your tickets are not valid until the time of your reservation.

Make a free reservation
